label: OrganizationalCertificate
comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.
A code specifying an applicable object, such as item, animal, person or organization, for this agricultural certificate.
A code specifying a type of specified certificate.
An expiry date, time, date time or other date time value for this specified licence.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
The code specifying the reason for the issue of this process certificate.
An identifier of a party issuing this sustainability assertion.
A code specifying a purpose for this field crop.
The requested effective date, time, date time or other date time value for this agricultural certificate.

objectProperties.comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A characteristic applicable to this organization certificate.
The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.

referencedBy.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
An organizational certificate obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
